h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ ya.m ^a^T0.0001^ea^ ^a^P5.0001^ea^ ^a^M0.0001^ea^ ^a^V0.0001^ea^ tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta.m, ka.m aarabbha, kismi.m vatthusmi.m? atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~natti? sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~natti? saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~natti? ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~natti? pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapanna.m? katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati? catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipatti? sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m ^a^V0.0002^ea^ katamo aapattikkhandho? channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaati? catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.na.m? sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammati? ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo? ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkha.m? kaa vipatti? kaa sampatti? kaa pa.tipatti? kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m? ke sikkhanti? ke sikkhitasikkhaa? kattha .thita.m? ke dhaarenti? kassa vacana.m? kenaabhatanti?

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ya.m tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa.thama.m ^a^T0.0002^ea^ paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~nattanti? vesaaliya.m pa~n~natta.m. ka.m aarabbhaati? sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbha. kismi.m vatthusminti? sudinno kalandaputto puraa.nadutiyikaaya methuna.m ^a^P5.0002^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevi, tasmi.m vatthusmi.m. atthi tattha pa~n~natti, anupa~n~natti, anuppannapa~n~nattiiti? ekaa pa~n~natti, dve anupa~n~nattiyo. anuppannapa~n~natti ^a^M0.0002^ea^ tasmi.m natthi. sabbatthapa~n~natti, padesapa~n~nattiiti? sabbatthapa~n~natti. saadhaara.napa~n~natti, asaadhaara.napa~n~nattiiti? saadhaara.napa~n~natti. ekatopa~n~natti, ubhatopa~n~nattiiti? ubhatopa~n~natti. pa~ncanna.m paatimokkhuddesaana.m katthogadha.m kattha pariyaapannanti? nidaanogadha.m, nidaanapariyaapanna.m. katamena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchatiiti? dutiyena uddesena uddesa.m aagacchati. catunna.m vipattiina.m katamaa vipattiiti? siilavipatti. sattanna.m aapattikkhandhaana.m katamo aapattikkhandhoti? paaraajikaapattikkhandho. channa.m aapattisamu.t.thaanaana.m katihi samu.t.thaanehi samu.t.thaatiiti? ekena samu.t.thaanena samu.t.thaati -- kaayato ca cittato ca samu.t.thaati, na vaacato. catunna.m adhikara.naana.m katama.m adhikara.nanti? aapattaadhikara.na.m. sattanna.m samathaana.m katihi samathehi sammatiiti? dviihi samathehi sammati -- sammukhaavinayena ca pa.ti~n~naatakara.nena ca. ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti? pa~n~natti vinayo, vibhatti abhivinayo. ki.m tattha paatimokkha.m, ki.m tattha adhipaatimokkhanti? pa~n~natti paatimokkha.m, vibhatti adhipaatimokkha.m. kaa vipattiiti? asa.mvaro vipatti. kaa ^a^T0.0003^ea^ sampattiiti? sa.mvaro sampatti. kaa pa.tipattiiti? na evaruupa.m karissaamiiti yaavajiiva.m aapaa.nako.tika.m samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. {a0 ni0 10.31} kati atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~nattanti? dasa atthavase pa.ticca bhagavataa pa.thama.m paaraajika.m pa~n~natta.m -- sa"nghasu.t.thutaaya, sa"nghaphaasutaaya, dumma"nkuuna.m puggalaana.m niggahaaya, pesalaana.m bhikkhuuna.m phaasuvihaaraaya, di.t.thadhammikaana.m aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya, samparaayikaana.m aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya, appasannaana.m pasaadaaya, pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya, saddhamma.t.thitiyaa, vinayaanuggahaaya. ke sikkhantiiti? sekkhaa ca puthujjanakalyaa.nakaa ca sikkhanti. ke sikkhitasikkhaati? arahanto sikkhitasikkhaa ^a^V0.0003^ea^. kattha .thitanti? sikkhaakaamesu .thita.m. ke dhaarentiiti? yesa.m vattati te dhaarenti. kassa vacananti? bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa. kenaabhatanti? paramparaabhata.m --

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ methuna.m ^a^V0.0096^ea^ dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati ^a^P5.0051^ea^? methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa catasso aapattiyo aapajjati -- akkhaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti paaraajikassa; yebhuyyena khaayite sariire methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevati, aapatti thullaccayassa ^a^M0.0089^ea^; va.t.takate mukhe acchupanta.m a"ngajaata.m paveseti, aapatti dukka.tassa; jatuma.t.thake paacittiya.m -- methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanapaccayaa imaa ^a^T0.0127^ea^ catasso aapattiyo aapajjati.

[03] adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa kati aapattiyo aapajjati? adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati. pa~ncamaasaka.m vaa atirekapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti paaraajikassa; atirekamaasaka.m vaa uunapa~ncamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti thullaccayassa; maasaka.m vaa uunamaasaka.m vaa agghanaka.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyati, aapatti dukka.tassa -- adinna.m aadiyanapaccayaa imaa tisso aapattiyo aapajjati.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ anuvijjake ^a^T0.0396^ea^ ^a^P5.0160^ea^ ^a^M0.0281^ea^ ^a^V0.0304^ea^ codako pucchitabbo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m codesi, kimhi na.m codesi, siilavipattiyaa vaa codesi, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa codesi, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa codesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``siilavipattiyaa vaa codemi, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa codemi, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa codemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``jaanaasi panaayasmaa siilavipatti.m, jaanaasi aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaasi di.t.thivipatti''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``jaanaami kho aha.m, aavuso, siilavipatti.m, jaanaami aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaami di.t.thivipatti''nti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``katamaa panaavuso, siilavipatti? katamaa aacaaravipatti? katamaa di.t.thivipattii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``cattaari ca paaraajikaani, terasa ca sa"nghaadisesaa -- aya.m siilavipatti. thullaccaya.m, paacittiya.m, paa.tidesaniiya.m, dukka.ta.m, dubbhaasita.m, aya.m aacaaravipatti. micchaadi.t.thi, antaggaahikaa di.t.thi -- aya.m di.t.thivipattii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m codesi, di.t.thena vaa codesi sutena vaa codesi parisa"nkaaya vaa codesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``di.t.thena vaa codemi sutena vaa codemi parisa"nkaaya vaa codemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, ima.m bhikkhu.m di.t.thena codesi, ki.m te di.t.tha.m kinti te di.t.tha.m, kadaa ^a^T0.0397^ea^ te di.t.tha.m, kattha te di.t.tha.m paaraajika.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, kattha ca tva.m ahosi, kattha caaya.m bhikkhu ahosi, ki~nca tva.m karosi, ki.m caaya.m bhikkhu karotii''ti? [03] sa"nghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukaamena na upajjhaayo pucchitabbo, na aacariyo pucchitabbo, na saddhivihaariko pucchitabbo, na antevaasiko pucchitabbo, na samaanupajjhaayako pucchitabbo, na samaanaacariyako pucchitabbo, na jaati pucchitabbaa, na naama.m pucchitabba.m, na gotta.m pucchitabba.m, na aagamo pucchitabbo, na kulapadeso pucchitabbo, na jaatibhuumi pucchitabbaa. ta.m ki.m kaara.naa? atrassa pema.m vaa doso vaa. peme vaa sati dose vaa, chandaapi gaccheyya dosaapi gaccheyya mohaapi gaccheyya bhayaapi gaccheyya.

[03] sa"nghena anumatena puggalena anuvijjakena anuvijjitukaamena sa"nghagarukena bhavitabba.m no puggalagarukena, saddhammagarukena bhavitabba.m no aamisagarukena, atthavasikena bhavitabba.m no parisakappikena, kaalena anuvijjitabba.m no akaalena, bhuutena anuvijjitabba.m ^a^T0.0405^ea^ no abhuutena, sa.nhena anuvijjitabba.m no pharusena, atthasa.mhitena anuvijjitabba.m no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacittena anuvijjitabba.m no dosantarena, na upaka.n.nakajappinaa bhavitabba.m, na ^a^V0.0311^ea^ jimha.m pekkhitabba.m, na akkhi nikha.nitabba.m, na bhamuka.m ukkhipitabba.m, na siisa.m ukkhipitabba.m, na hatthavikaaro kaatabbo, na hatthamuddaa dassetabbaa.

[03] aasanakusalena bhavitabba.m nisajjakusalena, yugamatta.m pekkhantena attha.m anuvidhiyantena sake aasane nisiiditabba.m, na ca aasanaa vu.t.thaatabba.m ^a^M0.0288^ea^, na viitihaatabba.m, na kummaggo sevitabbo, na baahaavikkhepaka.m {na vaacaa vikkhepaka.m (syaa0)} bha.nitabba.m, aturitena bhavitabba.m asaahasikena, aca.n.dikatena bhavitabba.m vacanakkhame ^a^P5.0164^ea^, mettaacittena bhavitabba.m hitaanukampinaa, kaaru.nikena bhavitabba.m hitaparisakkinaa, asamphappalaapinaa bhavitabba.m pariyantabhaa.ninaa, averavasikena bhavitabba.m anasuruttena, attaa pariggahetabbo, paro pariggahetabbo, codako pariggahetabbo, cuditako pariggahetabbo, adhammacodako pariggahetabbo, adhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, dhammacodako pariggahetabbo, dhammacuditako pariggahetabbo, vutta.m ahaapentena avutta.m apakaasentena oti.n.naani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m pariggahetvaa paro pa.tipucchitvaa yathaa pa.ti~n~naaya kaaretabbo, mando haasetabbo {vepo pahaasetabbo (syaa0)}, bhiiruu ^a^T0.0406^ea^ assaasetabbo, ca.n.do nisedhetabbo, asuci vibhaavetabbo, ujumaddavena na chandaagati.m gantabba.m, na dosaagati.m gantabba.m, na mohaagati.m gantabba.m, na bhayaagati.m gantabba.m, majjhattena bhavitabba.m dhammesu ca puggalesu ca. eva~nca pana anuvijjako anuvijjamaano satthu ceva saasanakaro hoti, vi~n~nuuna~nca sabrahmacaariina.m piyo ca hoti manaapo ca garu ca bhaavaniiyo ca.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ ^b^kataakata.m jaanitabba^eb^nti methunadhammo jaanitabbo, methunadhammassa anuloma.m jaanitabba.m, methunadhammassa pubbabhaago jaanitabbo. ^b^methunadhammo jaanitabbo^eb^ti dvaya.mdvayasamaapatti jaanitabbaa. ^b^methunadhammassa anuloma.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0292^ea^ ^b^jaanitabba^eb^nti bhikkhu attano mukhena parassa a"ngajaata.m ga.nhaati ^a^V0.0316^ea^. ^b^methunadhammassa pubbabhaago jaanitabbo^eb^ti va.n.naava.n.no {va.n.no ava.n.no (syaa0)}, kaayasa.msaggo, du.t.thullavaacaa, attakaamapaaricariyaa, vacanamanuppadaana.m ^a^T0.0412^ea^ {dhanamanuppadaana.m (ka0)}.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ ^b^na chandaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti chandaagati.m gacchanto katha.m chandaagati.m gacchati? idhekacco -- ``aya.m me upajjhaayo vaa aacariyo vaa saddhivihaariko vaa antevaasiko vaa samaanupajjhaayako vaa samaanaacariyako vaa sandi.t.tho vaa sambhatto vaa ~naatisaalohito vaa''ti, tassaanukampaaya tassaanurakkhaaya adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti, avinaya.m vinayoti diipeti, vinaya.m avinayoti diipeti, abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatena bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatenaati ^a^T0.0413^ea^ diipeti, bhaasita.m lapita.m tathaagatena abhaasita.m alapita.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatena aaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, aaci.n.na.m tathaagatena anaaci.n.na.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, apa~n~natta.m tathaagatena pa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, pa~n~natta.m tathaagatena apa~n~natta.m tathaagatenaati diipeti, anaapatti.m ^a^M0.0293^ea^ aapattiiti diipeti, aapatti.m anaapattiiti diipeti, lahuka.m aapatti.m garukaa aapattiiti diipeti, garuka.m aapatti.m lahukaa aapattiiti diipeti, saavasesa.m aapatti.m anavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti, anavasesa.m aapatti.m saavasesaa aapattiiti diipeti, du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m ^a^P5.0168^ea^ aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi chandaagati.m gacchanto bahujanaahitaaya ^a^V0.0317^ea^ pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi chandaagati.m gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. chandaagati.m gacchanto eva.m chandaagati.m gacchati.

[03] 380^b^.^eb^ ^b^na dosaagati gantabbaa^eb^ti dosaagati.m gacchanto katha.m dosaagati.m gacchati? idhekacco anattha.m me acariiti aaghaata.m bandhati, anattha.m me caratiiti aaghaata.m bandhati, anattha.m me carissatiiti ^a^T0.0414^ea^ aaghaata.m bandhati, piyassa me manaapassa anattha.m acari... anattha.m carati... anattha.m carissatiiti aaghaata.m bandhati, appiyassa me amanaapassa attha.m acari... attha.m carati... attha.m carissatiiti aaghaata.m bandhati. imehi navahi aaghaatavatthuuhi aaghaato pa.tighaato kuddho kodhaabhibhuuto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi dosaagati.m gacchanto bahujanaahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanaasukhaaya bahuno janassa anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. imehi a.t.thaarasahi vatthuuhi dosaagati.m gacchanto khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. dosaagati.m gacchanto eva.m dosaagati.m gacchati.

[21] chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa, yo dhamma.m ativattati.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti^eb^? adhamma.m adhammoti diipento sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti, dhamma.m dhammoti diipento ^a^T0.0418^ea^ sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipento sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa ^a^M0.0297^ea^ aapattiiti diipento sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti. eva.m sa~n~naapaniiye .thaane sa~n~naapeti.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha.m laddhapakkhomhiiti parapakkha.m avajaanaati^eb^? idhekacco laddhapakkho hoti laddhaparivaaro ^a^V0.0321^ea^ pakkhavaa ~naatimaa. ``aya.m aladdhapakkho aladdhaparivaaro na pakkhavaa na ~naatimaa''ti tassa avajaananto adhamma.m dhammoti diipeti, dhamma.m adhammoti diipeti...pe0... du.t.thulla.m aapatti.m adu.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti, adu.t.thulla.m aapatti.m du.t.thullaa aapattiiti diipeti. eva.m laddhapakkhomhiiti parapakkha.m avajaanaati.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena dhammenaa^eb^ti bhuutena vatthunaa. ^b^yena vinayenaa^eb^ti codetvaa saaretvaa. ^b^yena satthusaasanenaa^eb^ti ~nattisampadaaya anussaavanasampadaaya, yena dhammena yena vinayena yena satthusaasanena ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasammati, tathaa ta.m adhikara.na.m vuupasametabbanti.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ anuvijjakena codako pucchitabbo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno pavaara.na.m .thapesi, kimhi na.m .thapesi, siilavipattiyaa vaa .thapesi, aacaaravipattiyaa vaa .thapesi, di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa .thapesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``siilavipattiyaa vaa .thapemi ^a^V0.0322^ea^ aacaaravipattiyaa vaa .thapemi di.t.thivipattiyaa vaa .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``jaanaati panaayasmaa siilavipatti.m, jaanaati aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaati di.t.thivipatti''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``jaanaami kho aha.m, aavuso, siilavipatti.m, jaanaami aacaaravipatti.m, jaanaami di.t.thivipatti''nti ^a^T0.0421^ea^, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``katamaa ^a^M0.0299^ea^ panaavuso, siilavipatti katamaa aacaaravipatti katamaa di.t.thivipattii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``cattaari paaraajikaani terasa sa"nghaadisesaa -- aya.m siilavipatti. thullaccaya.m paacittiya.m paa.tidesaniiya.m dukka.ta.m dubbhaasita.m -- aya.m aacaaravipatti. micchaadi.t.thi antaggaahikaadi.t.thi -- aya.m di.t.thivipattii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno pavaara.na.m .thapesi, di.t.thena vaa .thapesi, sutena vaa .thapesi, parisa"nkaaya vaa .thapesii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``di.t.thena vaa .thapemi, sutena vaa .thapemi, parisa"nkaaya vaa .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno di.t.thena pavaara.na.m .thapesi, ki.m te di.t.tha.m, kinti te di.t.tha.m, kadaa te di.t.tha.m, kattha te di.t.tha.m, paaraajika.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapajjanto di.t.tho, kattha ca tva.m ahosi, kattha caaya.m bhikkhu ahosi, ki~nca tva.m karosi, ki.m caaya.m bhikkhu karotii''ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno di.t.thena pavaara.na.m .thapemi, api ca sutena pavaara.na.m .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno sutena pavaara.na.m .thapesi ^a^T0.0422^ea^ ki.m te suta.m, kinti te suta.m, kadaa te suta.m, kattha te suta.m, paaraajika.m ajjhaapannoti suta.m, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapannoti suta.m, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti suta.m, bhikkhussa suta.m, bhikkhuniyaa suta.m, sikkhamaanaaya suta.m, saama.nerassa suta.m, saama.neriyaa suta.m, upaasakassa suta.m, upaasikaaya suta.m, raajuuna.m suta.m, raajamahaamattaana.m suta.m, titthiyaana.m suta.m, titthiyasaavakaana.m suta''nti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- ``na kho aha.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno sutena pavaara.na.m .thapemi, api ca parisa"nkaaya pavaara.na.m .thapemii''ti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``ya.m kho tva.m, aavuso, imassa bhikkhuno parisa"nkaaya pavaara.na.m .thapesi, ki.m parisa"nkasi, kinti parisa"nkasi, kadaa parisa"nkasi, kattha parisa"nkasi, paaraajika.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, thullaccaya.m... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m... dubbhaasita.m ajjhaapannoti parisa"nkasi, bhikkhussa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, bhikkhuniyaa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, sikkhamaanaaya sutvaa parisa"nkasi, saama.nerassa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, saama.neriyaa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, upaasakassa sutvaa parisa"nkasi, upaasikaaya sutvaa ^a^M0.0300^ea^ parisa"nkasi, raajuuna.m sutvaa ^a^V0.0323^ea^ parisa"nkasi raajamahaamattaana.m ^a^T0.0423^ea^ sutvaa parisa"nkasi, titthiyaana.m sutvaa parisa"nkasi, titthiyasaavakaana.m sutvaa parisa"nkasii''ti?

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ ki.m te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kinti te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kadaa te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa? kattha te di.t.thanti katamaa pucchaa?

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ ^b^ki.m te di.t.tha^eb^nti vatthupucchaa, vipattipucchaa, aapattipucchaa, ajjhaacaarapucchaa. vatthupucchaati -- a.t.thapaaraajikaana.m vatthupucchaa, teviisasa"nghaadisesaana.m vatthupucchaa, dveaniyataana.m vatthupucchaa, dvecattaariisanissaggiyaana.m vatthupucchaa, a.t.thaasiitisatapaacittiyaana.m vatthupucchaa, dvaadasapaa.tidesaniiyaana.m vatthupucchaa, dukka.taana.m vatthupucchaa, dubbhaasitaana.m vatthupucchaa. vipattipucchaati -- siilavipattipucchaa, aacaaravipattipucchaa, di.t.thivipattipucchaa ^a^T0.0424^ea^, aajiivavipattipucchaa. aapattipucchaati -- paaraajikaapattipucchaa, sa"nghaadisesaapattipucchaa, thullaccayaapattipucchaa, paacittiyaapattipucchaa, paa.tidesaniiyaapattipucchaa, dukka.taapattipucchaa, dubbhaasitaapattipucchaa. ajjhaacaarapucchaati -- dvaya.mdvayasamaapattipucchaa.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ^b^kinti te di.t.tha^eb^nti li"ngapucchaa, iriyaapathapucchaa, aakaarapucchaa, vippakaarapucchaa. li"ngapucchaati -- diigha.m vaa rassa.m vaa ka.nha.m vaa odaata.m vaa. iriyaapathapucchaati gacchanta.m vaa .thita.m ^a^V0.0324^ea^ vaa nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa. aakaarapucchaati gihili"nge ^a^M0.0301^ea^ vaa titthiyali"nge vaa pabbajitali"nge vaa. vippakaarapucchaati gacchanta.m vaa .thita.m vaa nisinna.m vaa nipanna.m vaa.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ^b^kadaa^eb^ ^a^P5.0171^ea^ ^b^te di.t.tha^eb^nti kaalapucchaa, samayapucchaa, divasapucchaa, utupucchaa. kaalapucchaati pubba.nhakaale vaa majjhanhikakaale vaa saayanhakaale vaa. samayapucchaati pubba.nhasamaye vaa majjhanhikasamaye vaa saayanhasamaye vaa. divasapucchaati purebhatta.m vaa pacchaabhatta.m vaa ratti.m vaa divaa vaa kaa.le vaa ju.nhe vaa. utupucchaati hemante vaa gimhe vaa vasse vaa {vassaane vaa (sii0)}.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ kassa ^a^T0.0426^ea^ ^a^P5.0172^ea^ ^a^M0.0302^ea^ ^a^V0.0325^ea^ kathina.m {ka.thina.m (sii0 syaa0)} anatthata.m? kassa kathina.m atthata.m? kinti kathina.m anatthata.m? kinti kathina.m atthata.m?
[03] ^b^kassa kathina.m anatthata^eb^nti? dvinna.m puggalaana.m anatthata.m hoti kathina.m -- anatthaarakassa ca ananumodakassa ca. imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.
[03] ^b^kassa kathina.m atthata^eb^nti? dvinna.m puggalaana.m atthata.m hoti kathina.m -- atthaarakassa ca anumodakassa ca. imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m atthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] ^b^kinti kathina.m anatthata^eb^nti? catuviisatiyaa aakaarehi anatthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ullikhitamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na dhovanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ciivaravicaara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na chedanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na bandhanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ova.t.tiyakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ka.n.dusakara.namattena {na ga.n.dusakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na da.lhiikammakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na anuvaatakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na paribha.n.dakara.namattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ovaddheyyakara.namattena {na ova.t.teyyakara.namattena (sii0 syaa0), na ovadeyyakara.namattena (ka0)} atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na kambalamaddanamattena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na nimittakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na ^a^T0.0427^ea^ parikathaakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na kukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na sannidhikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na nissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na akappakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m ^a^V0.0326^ea^, na a~n~natra pa~ncakena vaa atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, na a~n~natra puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m ^a^M0.0303^ea^ hoti kathina.m, sammaa ce atthata.m hoti kathina.m ta.m ce nissiima.t.tho anumodati. evampi anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] nimittakamma.m naama nimitta.m karoti -- ``iminaa dussena kathina.m attharissaamii''ti. parikathaa naama parikatha.m karoti -- ``imaaya parikathaaya kathinadussa.m nibbattessaamii''ti. kukkukata.m naama anaadiyadaana.m vuccati. sannidhi naama dve sannidhiyo -- kara.nasannidhi vaa nicayasannidhi vaa. nissaggiya.m naama kayiramaane aru.na.m u.t.thahati {udriyati (sii0 syaa0)}. imehi catuviisatiyaa aakaarehi anatthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] ^b^kinti kathina.m atthata^eb^nti? sattarasahi aakaarehi atthata.m hoti kathina.m. ahatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ahatakappena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pilotikaaya atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa.msukuulena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, paapa.nikena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, animittakatena atthata.m ^a^T0.0428^ea^ hoti kathina.m, aparikathaakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, akukkukatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, asannidhikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, anissaggiyena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, kappakatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, sa"nghaa.tiyaa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, uttaraasa"ngena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, antaravaasakena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, pa~ncakena vaa atirekapa~ncakena vaa tadaheva sa~nchinnena sama.n.daliikatena atthata.m hoti kathina.m, puggalassa atthaaraa atthata.m hoti kathina.m, sammaa ce atthata.m hoti kathina.m, ta.m ce siima.t.tho anumodati, evampi atthata.m hoti kathina.m. imehi sattarasahi aakaarehi atthata.m hoti kathina.m.

[03] saha kathinassa atthaaraa kati dhammaa jaayanti? saha kathinassa atthaaraa pannarasa dhammaa jaayanti -- a.t.tha maatikaa, dve palibodhaa, pa~ncaanisa.msaa. saha kathinassa atthaaraa ime pannarasa dhammaa jaayanti.

[03] pubbakara.na.m payogassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. payogo pubbakara.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. pubbakara.na.m payogassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. paccuddhaaro pubbakara.nassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. pubbakara.na.m paccuddhaarassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. paccuddhaaro pubbakara.nassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m paccuddhaarassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paccuddhaaro adhi.t.thaanassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m paccuddhaarassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. atthaaro adhi.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. adhi.t.thaana.m atthaarassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T0.0430^ea^ paccayo. atthaaro adhi.t.thaanassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca atthaarassa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. atthaaro maatikaana~nca palibodhaana~nca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. maatikaa ca palibodhaa ca atthaarassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo. aasaa ^a^P5.0174^ea^ ca anaasaa ca vatthussa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo, nissayapaccayena paccayo ^a^M0.0305^ea^, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. vatthu aasaana~nca anaasaana~nca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. aasaa ca anaasaa ca vatthussa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. pannarasa dhammaa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ kati kathinuddhaaraa sa"nghaadhiinaa? kati kathinuddhaaraa puggalaadhiinaa? kati kathinuddhaaraa neva sa"nghaadhiinaa na puggalaadhiinaa? eko kathinuddhaaro sa"nghaadhiino ^a^M0.0312^ea^ -- antarubbhaaro. cattaaro kathinuddhaaraa puggalaadhiinaa -- pakkamanantiko, ni.t.thaanantiko, sanni.t.thaanantiko, siimaatikkamanantiko ^a^V0.0335^ea^. cattaaro kathinuddhaaraa neva sa"nghaadhiinaa na puggalaadhiinaa -- naasanantiko, savanantiko, aasaavacchediko, sahubbhaaro. kati ^a^T0.0442^ea^ ^a^P5.0179^ea^ kathinuddhaaraa antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti? kati kathinuddhaaraa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti? kati kathinuddhaaraa siyaa antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti siyaa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti? dve kathinuddhaaraa antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti -- antarubbhaaro, sahubbhaaro. tayo kathinuddhaaraa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti -- pakkamanantiko, savanantiko, siimaatikkamanantiko. cattaaro kathinuddhaaraa siyaa antosiimaaya uddhariyyanti siyaa bahisiimaaya uddhariyyanti -- ni.t.thaanantiko, sanni.t.thaanantiko, naasanantiko, aasaavacchediko.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa pa.tiggahaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa pa.tiggahaa. katame pa~nca? kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayena appa.tiggahita.m, kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena appa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayena appa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena appa.tiggahita.m, nissaggiyena diyyamaana.m kaayena vaa kaayappa.tibaddhena vaa appa.tiggahita.m -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa pa.tiggahaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa pa.tiggahaa. katame pa~nca? kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayena pa.tiggahita.m, kaayena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena pa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayena pa.tiggahita.m, kaayappa.tibaddhena diyyamaana.m kaayappa.tibaddhena pa.tiggahita.m, nissaggiyena diyyamaana.m kaayena vaa kaayappa.tibaddhena vaa pa.tiggahita.m -- ime ^a^T0.0461^ea^ kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa pa.tiggahaa''ti.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0188^ea^ ^a^V0.0348^ea^ nu kho, bhante, anatirittaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, anatirittaa. katame pa~nca? {paaci0 239} akappiyakata.m hoti, appa.tiggahitakata.m hoti anuccaaritakata.m hoti, ahatthapaase kata.m hoti, alameta.m sabbanti avutta.m hoti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca anatirittaa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, atirittaa. katame pa~nca? {paaci0 239} kappiyakata.m hoti, pa.tiggahitakata.m hoti, uccaaritakata.m hoti, hatthapaase kata.m hoti, alameta.m sabbanti vutta.m hoti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca atirittaa''ti.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^M0.0326^ea^ nu kho, bhante, aakaarehi pavaara.naa pa~n~naayatii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, aakaarehi pavaara.naa pa~n~naayati. katamehi pa~ncahi? {paaci0 239} asana.m pa~n~naayati, bhojana.m pa~n~naayati, hatthapaase .thito abhiharati, pa.tikkhepo pa~n~naayati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncahaakaarehi pavaara.naa pa~n~naayatii''ti.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, adhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, adhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa. katame pa~nca? bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno hoti, paaraajikena codiyamaano sa"nghaadisesa.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho sa"nghaadisesena kaareti, adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m ^a^T0.0462^ea^. bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno hoti, paaraajikena codiyamaano paacittiya.m...pe0... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho dukka.tena kaareti, adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno hoti. dukka.tena codiyamaano paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paaraajikena kaareti, adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. bhikkhu dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno hoti, dukka.tena codiyamaano sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paa.tidesaniiyena kaareti -- adhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. ime kho, upaali, pa~nca adhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa.

[03] ``pa~ncime, upaali, dhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa. katame pa~nca? bhikkhu paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno hoti, paaraajikena codiyamaano paaraajika.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati, ta.m sa"ngho paaraajikena kaareti, dhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. bhikkhu sa"nghaadisesa.m...pe0... paacittiya.m... paa.tidesaniiya.m... dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno hoti, dukka.tena codiyamaano dukka.ta.m ajjhaapanno pa.tijaanaati ^a^V0.0349^ea^, ta.m sa"ngho dukka.tena kaareti, dhammika.m pa.ti~n~naatakara.na.m. ime kho, upaali, pa~nca dhammikaa pa.ti~n~naatakara.naa''ti.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ ``katihi ^a^P5.0189^ea^ nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m ^a^M0.0327^ea^ kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca, caavanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno ^a^T0.0463^ea^ okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? lajjii ca hoti, pa.n.dito ca, pakatatto ca, vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no caavanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo na saakacchitabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo na saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m na jaanaati, nidaana.m na jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m na jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m na jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m na jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo na saakacchitabbo.

[03] ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo saakacchitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? vatthu.m jaanaati, nidaana.m jaanaati, pa~n~natti.m jaanaati, padapaccaabha.t.tha.m jaanaati, anusandhivacanapatha.m jaanaati -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatena bhikkhunaa saddhi.m vinayo saakacchitabbo''ti.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, pa~nhaapucchaa''ti? ``pa~ncimaa, upaali, pa~nhaapucchaa. katamaa pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa pa~nha.m pucchati, paapiccho icchaapakato pa~nha.m pucchati, paribhavaa pa~nha.m pucchati ^a^T0.0464^ea^, a~n~naatukaamo pa~nha.m pucchati, sace me pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ^a^V0.0350^ea^ icceta.m kusala.m no ce pa~nha.m pu.t.tho sammadeva byaakarissati ahamassa sammadeva byaakarissaamiiti pa~nha.m pucchati -- imaa kho, upaali, pa~nca pa~nhaapucchaa''ti.

[03] 433^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, a~n~nabyaakara.naa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, a~n~nabyaakara.naa. katame pa~nca? mandattaa momuuhattaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti, paapiccho icchaapakato a~n~na.m byaakaroti, ummaadaa cittakkhepaa a~n~na.m byaakaroti ^a^M0.0328^ea^, adhimaanena a~n~na.m byaakaroti, bhuuta.m a~n~na.m byaakaroti -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca a~n~nabyaakara.naa''ti.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``kati nu kho, bhante, visuddhiyo''ti? ``pa~ncimaa, upaali, visuddhiyo. katamaa pa~nca? nidaana.m uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m pa.thamaa visuddhi, nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m dutiyaa visuddhi, nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m tatiyaa visuddhi, nidaana.m uddisitvaa cattaari paaraajikaani uddisitvaa terasa sa"nghaadisese uddisitvaa dve aniyate uddisitvaa avasesa.m sutena saavetabba.m aya.m catutthaa visuddhi, vitthaareneva pa~ncamii -- imaa kho, upaali, pa~nca visuddhiyo''ti.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ ``kati ^a^P5.0190^ea^ nu kho, bhante, bhojanaa''ti? ``pa~ncime, upaali, bhojanaa ^a^T0.0465^ea^. katame pa~nca? odano, kummaaso, sattu, maccho, ma.msa.m -- ime kho, upaali, pa~nca bhojanaa''ti.
[06] di.t.thaavikammavaggo ni.t.thito catuttho.
[06] tassuddaana.m --
[21] di.t.thaavikammaa apare, pa.tiggahaanatirittaa.
[27] pavaara.naa pa.ti~n~naata.m, okaasa.m saakacchena ca.
[22] pa~nha.m a~n~nabyaakara.naa, visuddhi caapi bhojanaati..

[03] 436^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 399; a0 ni0 10.44} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m ^a^V0.0351^ea^ paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, sa.mvijjati nu kho me ^a^M0.0329^ea^ eso dhammo udaahu no''ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhu parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena kaayasamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa kaayika.m sikkhassuu'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro nu khomhi, parisuddhenamhi vaciisamaacaarena ^a^T0.0466^ea^ samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhu parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhena vaciisamaacaarena samannaagato acchiddena appa.tima.msena, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa vaacasika.m sikkhassuu'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `metta.m nu kho me citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno metta.m citta.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu anaaghaata.m, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa sabrahmacaariisu metta.m citta.m upa.t.thaapehii'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `bahussuto nu khomhi sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaa me dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m ^a^T0.0467^ea^ sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupassa dhammaa na bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa aagama.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro.

[03] ``puna ^a^M0.0330^ea^ ^a^V0.0352^ea^ capara.m, upaali, codakena bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ubhayaani kho me paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, sa.mvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udaahu no'ti. no ce, upaali, bhikkhuno ubhayaani paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso, `ida.m panaavuso kattha vutta.m bhagavataa'ti iti pu.t.tho na sampaayati {na sampaadayati (ka0), na sampaadeti (syaa0)}, tassa bhavanti vattaaro -- `i"ngha, taava aayasmaa vinaya.m pariyaapu.nassuu'ti itissa bhavanti vattaaro. codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m paccavekkhitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 437^b^.^eb^ ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? kaalena vakkhaami no akaalena ^a^T0.0468^ea^, bhuutena vakkhaami no abhuutena, sa.nhena vakkhaami no pharusena, atthasa.mhitena vakkhaami no anatthasa.mhitena, mettaacitto vakkhaami no dosantaroti -- codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thaapetvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 438^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 400} ``codakena, bhante, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena kati dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti? ``codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo. katame pa~nca? kaaru~n~nataa, hitesitaa, anukampataa, aapattivu.t.thaanataa, vinayapurekkhaarataa -- codakenupaali, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m manasi karitvaa paro codetabbo''ti.

[03] 439^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? aparisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti ^a^M0.0331^ea^, aparisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, aparisuddhaajiivo hoti, baalo hoti abyatto, na pa.tibalo anuyu~njiyamaano anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi ^a^P5.0191^ea^ kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa naala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m.

[03] ``pa~ncahupaali ^a^V0.0353^ea^, a"ngehi ^a^T0.0469^ea^ samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu.m. katamehi pa~ncahi? parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro hoti, parisuddhaajiivo hoti, pa.n.dito hoti byatto pa.tibalo anuyu~njiyamaano anuyoga.m daatu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno okaasakamma.m kaaraapentassa ala.m okaasakamma.m kaatu''nti.

[03] 440^b^.^eb^ {cuu.lava0 398} ``attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, bhante, bhikkhunaa katiha"ngehi samannaagata.m attaadaana.m aadaatabba''nti? ``attaadaana.m aadaatukaamenupaali, bhikkhunaa pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m {pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagata.m (sii0 syaa0)} attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m. katame pa~nca {katamehi pa~ncahi (syaa0)}? attaadaana.m aadaatukaamena, upaali, bhikkhunaa eva.m paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, kaalo nu kho ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `akaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m no kaalo'ti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03] ``sace panupaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `kaalo ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatu.m no akaalo'ti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo bhuuta.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `abhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m no bhuuta'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano ^a^T0.0470^ea^ eva.m jaanaati -- `bhuuta.m ida.m attaadaana.m no abhuuta'nti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ya.m kho aha.m ima.m attaadaana.m aadaatukaamo, atthasa.mhita.m nu kho ida.m attaadaana.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati ^a^M0.0332^ea^ --' anatthasa.mhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m no atthasa.mhita'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `atthasa.mhita.m ida.m attaadaana.m no anatthasa.mhita'nti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano ^a^V0.0354^ea^ na labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ida.m kho aha.m attaadaana.m aadiyamaano labhissaami sandi.t.the sambhatte bhikkhuu dhammato vinayato pakkhe'ti, tenupaali bhikkhunaa uttari paccavekkhitabba.m -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na.m udaahu no'ti. sace, upaali, bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado ^a^T0.0471^ea^ sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, na ta.m, upaali, attaadaana.m aadaatabba.m.

[03] ``sace panupaali bhikkhu paccavekkhamaano eva.m jaanaati -- `ima.m kho me attaadaana.m aadiyato na bhavissati sa"nghassa tatonidaana.m bha.n.dana.m kalaho viggaho vivaado sa"nghabhedo sa"ngharaaji sa"nghavavatthaana.m sa"nghanaanaakara.na'nti, ta.m aadaatabba.m, upaali, attaadaana.m. eva.m pa~nca"ngasamannaagata.m kho, upaali, attaadaana.m aadinna.m pacchaapi avippa.tisaarakara.m bhavissatii''ti.

[03] 441^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hotii''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti. katamehi pa~ncahi? siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati ^a^M0.0333^ea^ sikkhaapadesu; bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo; ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti tathaaruupassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, ubhayaani kho panassa paatimokkhaani vitthaarena svaagataani honti suvibhattaani suppavattiini suvinicchitaani suttaso anubya~njanaso; vinaye kho pana .thito hoti asa.mhiiro; pa.tibalo hoti ^a^T0.0472^ea^ ubho atthapaccatthike assaasetu.m sa~n~naapetu.m nijjhaapetu.m pekkhetu.m pasaadetu.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu adhikara.najaataana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahuupakaaro hoti.

[03] 445^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa ^a^T0.0477^ea^ bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti ^a^V0.0359^ea^ omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa kaatabbaa''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe ^a^M0.0337^ea^ uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa kaatabbaa. katamehi pa~ncahi? alajjii ca hoti, baalo ca, apakatatto ca, caavanaadhippaayo vattaa hoti, no vu.t.thaanaadhippaayo -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagatassa bhikkhuno sa"nghamajjhe uposatha.m vaa pavaara.na.m vaa .thapentassa -- `ala.m, bhikkhu, maa bha.n.dana.m, maa kalaha.m, maa viggaha.m, maa vivaada'nti omadditvaa sa"nghena uposatho vaa pavaara.naa vaa kaatabbaa.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ``katihi nu kho, bhante, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo''ti? ``pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? na atthakusalo hoti, na dhammakusalo hoti, na niruttikusalo hoti, na bya~njanakusalo hoti, na pubbaaparakusalo hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? atthakusalo hoti, dhammakusalo hoti, niruttikusalo ^a^M0.0343^ea^ hoti, bya~njanakusalo hoti, pubbaaparakusalo hoti ^a^T0.0486^ea^ -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.

[03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kodhano hoti kodhaabhibhuuto, makkhii hoti makkhaabhibhuuto, pa.laasii hoti pa.laasaabhibhuuto, issukii hoti issaabhibhuuto, sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? na kodhano hoti na kodhaabhibhuuto, na makkhii hoti na makkhaabhibhuuto, na pa.laasii hoti na pa.laasaabhibhuuto, na issukii hoti na issaabhibhuuto, asandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti anaadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.

[03] ``aparehipi ^a^P5.0198^ea^, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? kuppati, byaapajjati, pati.t.thiyati, kopa.m janeti, akhamo hoti apadakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo ^a^V0.0365^ea^. katamehi pa~ncahi? na kuppati, na byaapajjati, na pati.t.thiyati, na kopa.m janeti, khamo hoti padakkhi.naggaahii anusaasani.m -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi ^a^T0.0487^ea^ samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.

[03] ``aparehipi, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? pasaaretaa hoti no saaretaa, anokaasakamma.m kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, na yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, na yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya na sammannitabbo. pa~ncahupaali, a"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo. katamehi pa~ncahi? saaretaa hoti no pasaaretaa, okaasakamma.m ^a^M0.0344^ea^ kaaretvaa pavattaa hoti, yathaadhamma.m yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa codetaa hoti, yathaadhamme yathaavinaye yathaapattiyaa kaaretaa hoti, yathaadi.t.thiyaa byaakataa hoti -- imehi kho, upaali, pa~ncaha"ngehi samannaagato bhikkhu ubbaahikaaya sammannitabbo.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ cattaari ^a^T0.0538^ea^ ^a^P5.0220^ea^ ^a^M0.0380^ea^ ^a^V0.0406^ea^ kammaani. apalokanakamma.m, ~nattikamma.m, ~nattidutiyakamma.m, ~natticatutthakamma.m -- imaani cattaari kammaani. katihaakaarehi vipajjanti? imaani cattaari kammaani pa~ncahaakaarehi vipajjanti -- vatthuto vaa ~nattito vaa anussaavanato vaa siimato vaa parisato vaa.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti^eb^? sammukhaakara.niiya.m kamma.m asammukhaa karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; pa.tipucchaakara.niiya.m kamma.m apa.tipucchaa karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; pa.ti~n~naaya kara.niiya.m kamma.m apa.ti~n~naaya karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; sativinayaarahassa amuu.lhavinaya.m deti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; amuu.lhavinayaarahassa tassapaapiyasikaakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; tassapaapiyasikaakammaarahassa tajjaniiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; tajjaniiyakammaarahassa niyassakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; niyassakammaarahassa pabbaajaniiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; pabbaajaniiyakammaarahassa pa.tisaara.niiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; pa.tisaara.niiyakammaarahassa ukkhepaniiyakamma.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; ukkhepaniiyakammaarahassa parivaasa.m deti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m ^a^T0.0539^ea^; parivaasaaraha.m muulaaya pa.tikassati, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; muulaayapa.tikassanaarahassa maanatta.m deti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; maanattaaraha.m abbheti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; abbhaanaaraha.m upasampaadeti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; anuposathe uposatha.m karoti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m; apavaara.naaya pavaareti, vatthuvipanna.m adhammakamma.m. eva.m vatthuto kammaani vipajjanti.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^V0.0407^ea^ ^b^~nattito kammaani vipajjanti^eb^? pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani vipajjanti -- vatthu.m na paraamasati, sa"ngha.m na paraamasati, puggala.m na paraamasati, ~natti.m na paraamasati, pacchaa vaa ~natti.m .thapeti -- imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi ~nattito kammaani vipajjanti.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^a^M0.0381^ea^ ^b^anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^? pa~ncahaakaarehi ^a^P5.0221^ea^ anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti -- vatthu.m na paraamasati, sa"ngha.m na paraamasati, puggala.m na paraamasati, saavana.m haapeti, akaale vaa saaveti -- imehi pa~ncahaakaarehi anussaavanato kammaani vipajjanti.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ katha.m ^b^siimato kammaani vipajjanti^eb^? ekaadasahi aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti -- atikhuddaka.m siima.m sammannati, atimahati.m siima.m sammannati, kha.n.danimitta.m siima.m sammannati, chaayaanimitta.m siima.m ^a^T0.0540^ea^ sammannati, animitta.m siima.m sammannati, bahisiime .thito siima.m sammannati, nadiyaa siima.m sammannati, samudde siima.m sammannati, jaatassare siima.m sammannati, siimaaya siima.m sambhindati, siimaaya siima.m ajjhottharati -- imehi ekaadasahi aakaarehi siimato kammaani vipajjanti.
